subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to lend you some cash
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$383,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this one-minute form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://storeapsagain.com/
